name: backuppc
tagline: A network backup system with deduplication, scheduling, and web-based management
description: BackupPC is a high-performance network backup system designed for servers and desktops. It features disk-based storage, deduplication, a web interface, and extensive scheduling for hands-off data protection.

features.title: High Performance
features.description: High-performance backup for servers and desktops. Comprehensive protection

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Manage backups through browser. Easy administration

features.title: Database Backup
features.description: Set it and forget it backup schedules. Hands-off protection

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Support for SMB, rsync, and more. Flexible connectivity

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Complete control over backup infrastructure. Data sovereignty
